item.description:
This is the CANAL STREET Beerworks. We had so much fun at the Beerworks next to Fenway, that I decided... why not again?

I like it because it's casual, drinkers can find whatever they want, and the food is pretty good too.

You'll definitely be able to find me. I'll be the one wearing a Dungeons & Dragons T-Shirt.

The best T-Stop is going to be North Station.

See you there!

group.name: The Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup Group

item.name: July Boston Dungeons & Dragons Meetup
